attributes.action: Stop all immorgants into Britain. KEEP ISIS OUT!!!
attributes.additional_details: Stop all immigrants in Britan. ISIS is already in Britain threatening to change our country to and Islamic syltate and have the sharia law put in. But we keep letting "refugees" in knowing the majority are disguised ISIS members and we are allowing them in knowing full well. We need to take back our country and stop the poppy burning, disrespectful, murdering, delusional terrorists once and for all. THIS IS OUR COUNTRY
attributes.background: Stop all immorgantsinto Britain. This is OUR country and we need to take it back!!
